name: Forest (IMCG_KN)
description:
Forest is athmospheric horror game with PSX graphics made in unity. 

If game will be too hard i will add minimap with location of every list.

Tutorial:

Every list is on biggest trees in the forest. There are 11 lists. 

                            |

                            |

                           \/

Let me know if the game will be too hard. Thanks and enjoy! 

Assigned keys:

[WSAD] to move.

[F] to use flashlight.

[SHIFT] to run.

[LeftMouseButton] to collect/interact with items etc.
